title: An exposition vpon the Epistle to the Colossians Wherein, not onely the text is methodically analysed, and the sence of the words, by the help of vvriters, both ancient and moderne is explayned: but also, by doctrine and vse, the intent of the holy Ghost is in euery place more fully vnfolded and vrged. ... Being, the substance of neare seauen yeeres vveeke-dayes sermons, of N. Byfield, late one of the preachers for the citie of Chester.
author: Byfield, Nicholas, 1579-1622.
publisher: Printed by T. S[nodham. and Edward Griffin] for Nathaniel Butter, and are to be sould at his shop at the signe of the Pide-Bull in Pauls Church-yard, neare to S. Austins Gate,
notes: "[par.]3 is cancelled and replaced by [par.]3-6, printed by Griffin, who also printed quires R to the end."--STC.
